author: Deb Riechmann | AP
title: Medical intelligence sleuths tracked, warned of new virus
description: In late February, when President Donald Trump was urging Americans not to panic over the novel coronavirus, alarm bells were sounding at a little-known intelligence unit situated on a U.S. Army base near Washington
content: On Feb. 25, the medical intelligence unit raised its warning that the coronavirus would become a pandemic within 30 days from WATCHCON 2 a probable crisis to WATCHCON 1 an imminent one, according to a U.S. official. That was 15 days before the World Health Or… [+5373 chars]
